videos.headline: Illinois' Williams ejected on targeting penalty
videos.description: Bennett Williams is thrown out of the game in the first quarter on a targeting call for a helmet-to-helmet hit on Nebraska's Tyler Hoppes.

videos.headline: Pierson-EL streaks for  45-yard TD
videos.description: Tanner Lee finds De'Mornay Pierson-El for 45 yards and the touchdown to give Nebraska an early lead.

videos.headline: Green run gets Fighting Illini closer to FG
videos.description: Chayce Crouch connects with Carmoni Green for an 18-yard run that would help Illinois get on the board with a field goal.

videos.headline: Ozigbo pads Nebraska's lead with rushing TD
videos.description: Devine Ozigbo adds to Nebraska's lead over Illinois with a 15-yards run for the first touchdown for the Cornhuskers in the second quarter.

videos.headline: Nebraska gets big stop with sack
videos.description: Nebraska's Chris Weber sacks Kendrick Foster for a 5-yard loss on third down.

videos.headline: Hoppes' TD extends Nebraska's lead
videos.description: Tanner Lee finds an open Tyler Hoppes for the Cornhuskers' second touchdown in the second quarter.

videos.headline: Crouch avoids sacks to get Illinois closer to FG
videos.description: Chayce Crouch avoids numerous sack attempts and passes to Malik Turner for an 11-yard gain to get the Fighting Illini to field goal range.

videos.headline: Morgan makes juggling catch in traffic
videos.description: Stanley Morgan Jr. bobbles Tanner Lee's pass and still makes the great catch for a Cornhuskers'  first down.
